alert.note: Alert for Carter; Murray (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 11 at 4:46AM CDT until July 11 at 5:30AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Carter County in southern Oklahoma... Southern Murray County in southern Oklahoma... * Until 530 AM CDT. * At 446 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Milo, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sulphur, Davis, Springer, Dougherty, Gene Autry, Graham, Pooleville, Milo, Lake Of The Arbuckles, Turner Falls, and Hennepin. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
